text: I moved from net (small) long in exposure to market neutral after the market closed on Friday. We will see...
Lunch with the great Tobias Levkovich (second to right) two years ago in Palm Beach with Lee Cooperman Jeff Greene Jack Ablin and Jerry Jordan

I received this email from Tobias Levkovich several months ago: -----Original Message----- From: Levkovich, Tobias <tobias.levkovich@citi.com> To: Levkovich, Tobias <tobias.levkovich@citi.com> Sent: Sun, Mar 21, 2021 12:05 pm Subject: Passover I wanted to take this opportunity

to wish you and your family a Happy and Healthy Passover! May the spirit of liberation from slavery be a reminder of G-d’s mercy and recognition of our ancestors’ suffering. Let Freedom reign amidst a world that needs recovery from the Covid pandemic as we begin to see some

vaccine lights at the end of the tunnel. This holiday provides us the great opportunity to appreciate our families and the good things we have versus the often less important stuff that we don’t. Best, T Tobias Levkovich | Chief US Equity Strategist Managing Director
succinct, well put, rick. tobias was a gem.

RIP Tobias His last appearance @business with @ferrotv @lisaabramowicz1 @tomkeene piped.video/watch?v=Z7GuNvzP… @jimcramer @saraeisen @WilfredFrost @Sarge986 @ScottWapnerCNBC @LizAnnSonders @RiskReversal @GuyAdami @terranovajoe @MelissaLeeCNBC @SullyCNBC @carlquintanilla @davidfaber

It is with great sadness that I report that my dear friend and (three decade) confidante Tobias Levkovich has passed away. Words can't express my sadness this morning. @jimcramer @tomkeene @ferrotv @lisaabramowicz1 @carlquintanilla @saraeisen reuters.com/world/us/citigro…
